plot: An American spy is sent to Italy to intercept a secret mission involving the destruction of a plane full of scientists.
title: La spia che viene dal mare
plot_es: An American spy is sent to Italy to intercept a secret mission involving the destruction of a plane full of scientists.
original_name: La spia che viene dal mare
plot_en: An American spy is sent to Italy to intercept a secret mission involving the destruction of a plane full of scientists.
